overview:
Ram is an experienced high tech entrepreneur, manager and business consultant.

Founded FusionOps in early 2000 and helped define new products, raise money, build a team to market and sell the first on-demand, self service business analytics solution for SAP. FusionOps customers include Honda, Varian Medical Systems and SMART Modular Technologies and its on-demand solutions enable supply chain automation and immediate information visibility and business analytics.

Earlier, Ram was a senior partner at KPMG Consulting responsible for the B2B Supply Chain and Datawarehouse practices.
